name: Blade of Dark Triumph
description: You strengthen the bond between your fiendish boon weapon and its unholy spirit. The weapon gains the ghost touchproperty. You may change your weapon's damage type (bludgeoning, piercing, slashing) as a swift action. You gain a profane bonus to your CMD against disarm and sunder attacks directed at your boon weapon; this bonus is equal to half your caster level.
